solution_line_template: If Mary collected twice the number of red marbles collected by Jenny, she got {mary_red_multiplier}*{jenny_red_marbles} = <<{mary_red_multiplier}*{jenny_red_marbles}={mary_red_marbles}>>{mary_red_marbles} red marbles.
Anie collected {anie_red_more} more red marbles than Mary, which is {mary_red_marbles}+{anie_red_more} = {anie_red_marbles} red marbles.

The total number of red marbles is {mary_red_marbles}+{anie_red_marbles}+{jenny_red_marbles} = <<{mary_red_marbles}+{anie_red_marbles}+{jenny_red_marbles}={total_red_marbles}>>{total_red_marbles} red marbles.

If Anie collected twice the number of blue marbles collected by Jenny, then she got {anie_blue_multiplier}*{jenny_blue_marbles} = <<{anie_blue_multiplier}*{jenny_blue_marbles}={anie_blue_marbles}>>{anie_blue_marbles} blue marbles.
Mary collected half the number of blue marbles collected by Anie, thus {mary_blue_fraction}*{anie_blue_marbles} = {mary_blue_marbles} marbles

The total number of blue marbles collected is {anie_blue_marbles}+{mary_blue_marbles}+{jenny_blue_marbles} = <<{anie_blue_marbles}+{mary_blue_marbles}+{jenny_blue_marbles}={total_blue_marbles}>>{total_blue_marbles} blue marbles
